ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank ICGC ( https://www.icgc-argo.org) and TCGA (http:// cancergenome.nih.gov) for data collection, as well as GEPIA2 (http:// gepia2.cancer-pku.cn), cBioPortal ( http://www.cbioportal.org, version v3.2.11) and TIMER ( https://cistrome.shinyapps.io/timer) for the provision of data processing and customizable functions. Especially, the author X.H. would like to express deepest gratitude to Prof. Guido Kroemer for cancer immunity-associated technological training, conceptual inspiration, and moral edification in his laboratory.
